price: (Ibyo twabikoraga kugira ngo) ba bandi bajya impaka ku bimenyetso byacu, bamenye ko nta buhungiro bazagira.
arabic: وَيَعۡلَمَ ٱلَّذِينَ يُجَٰدِلُونَ فِيٓ ءَايَٰتِنَا مَا لَهُم مِّن مَّحِيصٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wayaʿlama alladhīna yujādilūna fī āyātinā mā lahum min maḥīṣin
